column4: i'm hoping to upgrade from jaunty (9.04) to lucid (10.4). do you guys recommend going thru successive upgrades or remove backup data, remove januty and do a fresh lucid install?
i have an NVIDIA graphics card, and i'm not seeing that problems associated it when going from 9.04 to 9.10 have faded away!
that's why i said that is your decission to make. only you know what are the issues you may encounter ... or how hard is to backup data/configurations in case of a fresh install
